Tucson lies back as asked.  He couldn't help it but he could tell that some=
thing in his spark was definitely coming alive.  He had never really gotten=
 into a relationship with a femme bot, due to the fact that he knew he was =
a bit shy when it came to that department.  He could feel his spark thumpin=
g away in his chest, and puts a hand over it.  He smiles. 

" The spark nev=
er lies."

Gently he takes Talon's hand and puts it on his chest where ever=
y beat of his spark can be felt.

on's face with a tenderness he had not expressed since meeting her and the =
others. He smiles and now gets an idea of what she may look like. Afterward=
s, he gently covers her hand with his own.

 My hands - tell me there's a - beautiful Maximal standing beside me, and I=
'd - really hate to miss it."
